entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus

text:
Last week, I reduced the allowable size of weddings and funerals and prohibited receptions to slow the spread of COVID-19.

Those rules will now take effect at 12:01 AM on Monday, August 10th.
